00041 //

00043 {
00044   Declare_instanciable(Parametre_implicite);
00045 public:

00048     return le_solveur_ ;

00066   };

00068   {
00069     return  seuil_diffusion_implicite_ ;
00070   };

00074   };

00078   };
00079   inline int equation_frequence_resolue(double t)
00080   {
00081     equation_frequence_resolue_.setVar("t",t);
00082     return (int)equation_frequence_resolue_.eval() ;
00083   };
00084
